WRITING.TITLE: *Spoilers* Question about Suka Suka anime *Spoilers*
WRITING.TEXT: Ok, I don't deal well with tragic sad stuff, and I just watched the first 4 episodes of the anime and I'm getting a "this will end badly" vibe from it, by that I mean fuck me up lol. Please spoil me because I need to know before I get attached, Spoilers do not bother me. Do Kutori and Willem end up together? Do they die? Do all the little girls die? I must know TY!
Dr. Manhattan, he would deconstruct Saitama, Goku, Superman, any fictional character on an atomic level.
People like you should never have children so your dumb fuckery won't spread to future generations
Clicking? never heard of clicking but doesn't sound ideal...
What a fat fucking piece of shit. I hope he fucking dies before he gets any money out of people. Waste of life.
When are the election results expected to come in?

I would just like to say, I've never been more proud to be a conservative at any time in my life than right now at this current point in history. The absolute ignorance and hypocrisy of liberals is mind boggling.
Yeah it's a fucking disgrace to women
Yeah you too, buried up hillarys cunt

My grandpa had alzheimer's and ultimately ended up passing away from it. He was always joking around and was pretty foul mouthed. He moved in with my parents so they could take care of him for about a year before his death. We were pretty close and I remember about 5 months before he died, I walked in to the kitchen to see him putting his shoes in the microwave, I said grandpa... what are you doing? He looked at me and with a complete stone cold face said "nothing what the fuck are you doing." I couldn't help but laugh and at his funeral I randomly thought of that moment and started laughing really hard in front of my whole family, not only that but I couldn't stop laughing. Everyone was staring at me, but I know that my grandpa would have been laughing with me if he could have.
